items.name: init(identifier: NSFileProviderDomainIdentifier, displayName: String, pathRelativeToDocumentStorage: String)
init(identifier: NSFileProviderDomainIdentifier, displayName: String)
items.desc: Creates a new file provider domain with the specified identifier and display name.

items.name: struct NSFileProviderDomainIdentifier
items.desc: A unique identifier for a file provider's domain.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: The name of the domain displayed in the user interface.

items.name: var backingStoreIdentity: Data?
items.desc: A unique identifier for the backing store used by the system.

items.name: var pathRelativeToDocumentStorage: String
items.desc: The path of the domain's subdirectory relative to the file provider's shared container.

items.name: var isHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the domain is visible to users.

items.name: var userEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has enabled or disabled the domain.

items.name: var isDisconnected: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating that the domain is present, but disconnected from the file extension.

items.name: var testingModes: NSFileProviderDomain.TestingModes
items.desc: A mode that gives the File Provider extension more control over the system’s behavior during testing.

items.name: struct NSFileProviderDomain.TestingModes
items.desc: Modes that modify the system’s behavior while testing.
